about_the_game:
Zombots is a fast-paced FPS inspired by the intensity of Doom and the charm and replayability of Brotatoe. Blast your way through hordes of enemies in style while listening to the adrenaline-pumping soundtrack.

Features:

Roguelike Gameplay: Survive wave after wave as you upgrade your arsenal and unlock new abilities to meet the increasing difficulty. Survive until daybreak, or die trying.

Powerful Weapons: Fire away with a variety of exotic guns. From the rapid-fire shotgun to the sticky plasma launcher, you’ll surely find the right tool for the job. Upgrade your weapons to unlock their full potential.

Unique Abilities: Augment your character to turn the tides against the invaders with abilities such as an evasive dash, devastating energy sword, automatic shoulder-turrets and more.

Dangerous Enemies: Between the mindless drones, stealthy assassins, towering titans and more, you’ll need to keep your senses sharp and your fingers trigger-happy if you want to survive each night.

Leaderboards: Grow and maintain your score multiplier while clearing levels to set a new high score as you work your way up the ranks.
